reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: FLC: Ditshwanelo - The Botswana Centre for Human Rights
PYM: Ditshwanelo - The Botswana centre for Human Rights

description.narrative: Ditshwanelo is the only holistic Human Rights organisation in Botswana and has been leading the Civil Society Organisation(CSO) input into the UN Human Rights Council Universal Periodical review ( UPR) process and has been responsible for pushing through p hase1 prepations.The organisation also has a well established relationship with the Government of Botswana( GOB) ministries and departments that have Human Rights training and Awareness raising activities.The key stakeholders of this action will be the n ational coordinating Committe(NCC) and CSO's. The project focus will be to suport CSO's to fulfill it role to facilitate meetings debriefs and workshops and to provide an oversight role to ensure effective collaboration and achievement of Objectives which is to lead and support CSO in to phase 2. elaboration of the Comprehensive Human Rights Strategy and the National Action plan (CHRSNAP) In preparation for Implementation for 2017/18.The GOB will provide 40% of the funding for over aperiod of 3 years.

tag.narrative: Improving democracy in societies is the main priority area in this activity
Strengthening of the rights and status of women and girls is a secondary priority area in this activity
